trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana longs to know what tomorrow brings.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_TODO_00<tab>Gather prophetic stones from Pike Falls.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the prophetic stones to the Ananta whispermaid.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_TODO_02<tab>Report to Eshana.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ESHANA_000_000<tab>The Velodyna Gatekeepers have done excellent work thus far monitoring our borders, but Alpa fears they grow complacent for lack of any serious threatsss.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ESHANA_000_001<tab>In the hopesss of motivating them, I thought we might revive one of the Ananta's more ancient traditions─divinationsss.

TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ESHANA_000_002<tab>To divine the fortunes of war, custom dictates one versssed in its art gather three precious stones required for the ritual. I can think of none better than you for this task.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ESHANA_100_002<tab>When you have procured the gems we require, deliver them to the Ananta whissspermaid.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_003<tab>To read the fortunes of war I require three prophetic ssstones. No more, no lesss. Bring them to me and all shall be revealed.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_010<tab>You are returned. Have you the prophetic ssstones I require?
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_011<tab>These shall do nicely. Now, let us sssee what the future holds for the Velodyna Gatekeepers.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_100_011<tab>Yesss, the misssts are clearing.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_012<tab>Great peril awaits in the days ahead. Calamity born from carelessness. They would do well not to lose focusss lest this future come to pass.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_013<tab>Ah! I see great successs for the Gatekeepers! The efforts of their training shall be returned three─nay, four-fold!
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_100_013<tab>Ahem. My apologies. 'Tis not often fortune sssmiles so favorably upon us.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_014<tab>Ah! Great fortune awaits the Gatekeepers! An unexpected windfall for the benefit of all!
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_100_014<tab>Ahem. Forgive me. It has been too long since fortune has sssmiled upon us so favorably.

TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_015<tab>Hmmm... The future is riddled with uncertainty, but I sssense the potential for discord within our ranksss. Geniality is more important now than ever.

TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_016<tab>I foresee a fortuitous meeting. Newly formed ties should be treated with the greatessst of care. In doing so we shall not want for allies in times of strife.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_017<tab>The power of the stones is spent, and thusss the vision ends.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ANANTAREADER03042_000_018<tab>I would stay, but my sisters in Vira Nilya have need of my insssight. Pray tell Eshana what I have seen.
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ESHANA_000_020<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What did she have to say of our future? What fortune awaitsss the Gatekeepers?
TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ESHANA_000_021<tab>Interesting... I will make certain my sssisters hear of this and act accordingly. The word of a whissspermaid is not to be taken lightly.

TEXT_BANANA301_03042_ESHANA_000_022<tab>Though not always clear, their divinations remain in our thoughts, guiding our actions in the hopes of a desirable outcome. I daresay you too would do well to adhere to her words. It may prove to your benefit.
